## Datasets

Download and save datasets to use for tutorial tasks here. Either copy the link to use in `readr::read_csv()`, or save the data at the link to a .csv file to read in.

+--------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Filename     | Citation/Source                                                                                  | Comments                                                                                                                                | URL                                                                                   |
+:=============+:=================================================================================================+:========================================================================================================================================+:======================================================================================+
| syn_data.csv | [Mealor et al., 2016](https://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0155483) | Dataset publicly available                                                                                                              | [Link](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/drmankin/practicum/master/data/syn_data.csv) |
+--------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| anx_data.csv | [Terry, Lea, & Field (in prep)](https://osf.io/8jk5v/)                                           | Dataset shared for teaching purposes. Note that demographics in this dataset are SIMULATED FOR TEACHING PURPOSES and are NOT real data. | [Link](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/drmankin/practicum/master/data/anx_data.csv) |
+--------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
